column1: Smoque BBQ////I should start by saying that I'm a bbq enthusiast and smoke my own baby backs
column4: and briskets.  I wanted to try Smoque because of all the raves it's been receiving.  Let's face it
column5: Chicago is not the place for good q
column6: but hopefully that's changing.  I tried everything they had and
column8: liked it (and it didn't cost as much as I thought it would).  It's nice that they actually smoke the meat
column10: in their big ol' Southern Pride Smoker.
